by the time you read this will be dead dont think anyone will be surprised that finally did it maybe thats the worst part of it all have made people so worried but they wont have be worried that it will happen because it with certainty did im tired of being in pain all of the time and im tired of being so lonely people tell me that am not alone but have been alone for long time have loved and will miss everyone that have ever had in my life but am not sorry that did this hope you will understand but no one has really understood me in the first place so it wouldnt be the first time the funniest part of it all is that deserve this wish things would have ended up differently but theres got to be reason why failed im tired of distracting myself with video games music or some other thing im tired of having to talk myself off the edge every time feel like killing myself am terrible person dont feel sad for me because its either live long life of feeling like shit or cutting it short my therapist told me that should be nicer to myself and be curious about life but cant do it it anymore deserve suicide my mental health has already caused pain for the ones that left but mostly for the ones that stayed to see me slowing die and dont even get me started all of the hospital bills and dont even feel any better the fact is im sick of watching everyone have fun with their friends spending weekends having fun complaining about stupid shit like guys that dont love them or tests being hard used to be like that and the pain of losing it all it too much to bare dont want to live life as the ghost of the person used to be im terrified of spending my st birthday alone would rather be dead dont say you didnt see this coming because if you didnt then you truly didnt know me at all donate my body to science peace out with love edit its been few days since posted this im thankful for all of the comments and dms to give an answer to few questions am in therapy did reaching out as hinted reaching out made me lose lot of people and one person told me was over sharing and am meds nothing in life seems worth it or interesting to me sometimes feel okay but it is overweighted by emptiness loneliness and depression today was my stepdads birthday and didnt want to ruin his birthday with my death but it has passed still think im going to do it picked the building and now its just waiting game or maybe will buy gun edit months have passed am doing lot better my birthday passed and it was great amount of fun im not perfectly mentally healthy but we are starting to want to live again edit months have passed graduated college also started prozac in addition to my other meds and that was really helpful reconnected with one of my best friends from high school and it has been really nice to talk to also tried animal crossing so thats been my hyperfixation overall am doing lot better but there are still some rough spots edit months have passed guess might do this as kind of journal its been helping me out coming back to it and reading it its crazy because read what wrote months ago and feel like dont know that person anymore understand who she is and how much pain she was in but feel so far removed from that and its amazing dont want this to sound like success story because still have really hard days and nobodys success story is going to help but digress still struggle with selfharm but dont feel suicidal everyday like used to am really doing well because its the summer but also have plans with new friends that made we plan going camping trip in couple of weeks so im super excited about that was hyperfixated animal crossing for little bit but found two horror games that really really like im applying to jobs still havent found one but hope that ill find one eventually also met this guy right after posted my last update he is really cool and he lives far away but im going to meet him at the end of this month im super excited dont want to rush into anything though obviously because still have long way to go with my health have been doing better in therapy and its been helping me lot more than it has been in couple of years anyways thats all have for today edit months have passed hey guys it is time to give another update thank you everyone for the continued kind messages and for those who commented cruel things hope the best fot you as well found good job that am going to start in few weeks am going to be working with children with special needs am nervous but am also excited never saw myself working with kids but this is not what want to do long term really want to get my phd it is my dream lost that dream before all this want to make it reality am still struggling with self harm and big emotions but iiyiyim
